```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)

## Global options
options(max.print="75")
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
	             cache=FALSE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=FALSE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE)
opts_knit$set(width=75)
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

rmd <- list.files(pattern = '*.Rmd',path = 'lab_journal', recursive = TRUE, include.dirs = TRUE)
chunks <- paste0("```{r child = 'lab_journal/", rmd, "'}\n```\n")
cat(chunks, sep = '\n')

```
